author: WSJ Staff
title: Brexit & Beyond: Eurozone Economy Stumbles in First Quarter
text: To subscribe to the newsletter, please sign up here MUST READS Eurozone Economy Wavers in First Quarter: The eurozone economy slowed in the first three months of this year, denting—but not ending—hopes of another year of strong growth after the currency bloc recorded its fastest expansion in a decade.
